job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the process of understanding and documenting what is needed from a business or product perspective.
This indicates interaction with stakeholders to understand product needs and align on deliverables.

job_tasks.phrase: Test design and test documentation maintenance
job_tasks.justification: This falls under the operational aspects of ensuring quality and maintainability of testing processes.
This involves the practical application of testing methodologies, a key component of operations and quality assurance.
This directly relates to the setup and upkeep of the necessary infrastructure for testing, which is part of MLOps/DevOps.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on testing, test environments, and requirements analysis, which are core to Quality Assurance and Software Development, not specifically GenAI or ML Engineering. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, LLMs, or related technologies.
